column5: Heres a few pics of my fully recovered pointer, you may remember my post about a chunk of glass from idiots shooting beer bottles slashing his leg severely 1 week before the hunting season. He's healed up nice and is doing what he does best.  Here he is with a woodcock pinned    Here he's pointing a grouse    A few hours of hunting.    Cheers, R
glad your dog is good now   . he sure is an awesome hunting dog...
Good to hear Ryan!,looks like he's right at home again.
Great photo bud.     Now ,if you could get a photo with a steel in his yap,that would be a great shot. LOL  Jasper is a great dog/friend.
I want a dog like this  how do I get one?
Glad he's all healed up.  What a great hunting dog
Beautiful dog, looks so much like mine it's scary.
LOL He dosent bark at Nascar jackets.
I would but that happens to be in a catch and release area  !! Lol ;-)
great news and he's looking none the worse for wear ! now if only those idiots who left the glass would fall bass ackwards into the same pile
